website_summaries.verdict: Lightweight and portable, this heat press handles small-sized projects with panache.
pros: Easy to use, and relatively lightweight
Owners like its compact size, and less experienced owners find it easy to use
Users like the swing-away movement which makes it easier to access transfer items
cons: Smaller press size limits the type of designs and clothing sizes that can be pressed
Reports of press no longer working after a few weeks or months of use

customer_reviews.title: Wont last
customer_reviews.text: Fairly disappointed...haven't even had this 9 months and it broke. Would be happy to change my review if I could actually reach someone to remedy the issue since it hasn't even been a year...but no one seems to be available when there's a problem. In case you can't tell from the photo, the piece holding the hot part to the handle literally broke into pieces and the hot part just fell.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: This is a nice little heat press
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice little heat press. I picked it up because its size will work out nicely for taking it with me when I do craft fairs. It seems to be pretty sturdy, it heats up fast and worked great with the few test items I made.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: So far so good. My son received for Christmas and has already ...
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. My son received for Christmas and has already pressed 7 shirts. It heats up great and seems to work fine!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Press!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great press! Very user friendly! I read reviews before purchasing and the ones that were not good were completely false. This press heats up super fast, there is no assembly required! Just plug in the power cord (which is included) and go. Also come with an instruction manual. A lot of presses do not. I would definitely recommend this press to anyone! Especially beginners :).
customer_reviews.author: jessica martinez

customer_reviews.title: Within a few weeks of use all of the hardware had began to come loose - and although this is an easy fix with the right tools - it is concerning
customer_reviews.text: The press is a decent entry level press - but it is also extremely cheap. Within a few weeks of use all of the hardware had began to come loose - and although this is an easy fix with the right tools - it is concerning. Also, the actual accuracy of the temperature gauge is a little questionable. But overall - great deal for the price! Just buy an adjustable wrench with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Kwolkoski

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME product
customer_reviews.text: I have never used a heat presser before, but so far is AWESOME!!!! It has cut my pressing time by half. Best decision I have made. It is a bit small but for a start up business like me is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Instructions would be greatly appreciated.
customer_reviews.text: It’d be great if they bothered to include even basic instructions. It comes with none! A google search brought up similar heat press instructions on how to ‘burn off’ the platens first and how to adjust the temp and pressure settings. Other than lack of instructions I like this smaller heat press very much. It’s pretty easy to use and takes up much less room than a large clamshell style. 90% of my projects fit on this and if it is bigger I simply press twice to get the whole area.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl3D

customer_reviews.title: ... presses in the past and this machine works as good if not better
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used more expensive heat presses in the past and this machine works as good if not better. It heats up faster. It’s easy to use, and it doesn’t take up all of my desk space. It’s perfect for what I use it for which is shirts. I would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Takes a while to heat up but it works great
customer_reviews.text: So far this press does exactly as described. It takes a little while to heat up and the surface is on the small side (not the products fault) but it does a great job. 15 second press with HTV vinyl at 315 degrees worked perfectly. I was not happy with the results from my iron so I wanted to try this and I am glad I did. The construction is solid and it seems like it will last a while.
customer_reviews.author: WEDisney

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Had a dent in it, back panel was off, and it doesn't line up correctly but it still gets the job done. Get the protection if they are still offering it from the outside vendor. They will take care of the damages.
customer_reviews.author: A T

customer_reviews.title: Spend your money on a better machine
customer_reviews.text: There was no information on how to set the controls when I received this. 8 months into using it the timer went out. 10 months into use and the handles started to stick and not hold the pressure. Now there have been issues with it over heating and running extremely hot and burning the vinyl. I am having to order another press all together due to this. I got this to use with craft shows due to it being lighter and more compact. I only used with 2 events and the rest of the time it was sitting in the same spot.
customer_reviews.author: Erj85

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for Comic Book Pressing purposes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased my press for quite a different reason. I wanted to start the process of learning how to press comic books to improve their grade. I found this machine to be extremely easy to use, and I could not be happier. I was so excited with the initial results that I immediately purchased a larger press by a different manufacturer. It proved to be a bad decision. This machine is much easier to use. I have now ordered a second machine to be able to work on more books at once. You really can't go wrong with this one!
customer_reviews.author: Larry R. Marsili

customer_reviews.title: but I will upgrade to a better press as soon as I am able
customer_reviews.text: So far it is working as needed. It's heavy and stable as far as the base is concerned but the upper portion of the press is very wobbly, and seems way to loose but I haven't been able to tighten it up. If I were to buy one again, I would get a larger platen. For a beginner press I think this is an ok piece of equipment, but I will upgrade to a better press as soon as I am able. This is great for kids and baby clothes but a little difficult for large transfers for adult clothing
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Barbaro

customer_reviews.title: Warranty is BS !!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this heat press the first 3 months I had it and then it starting this long nonstop beep noise and I would have to jiggle the cord well now it’s completely not working after having it less than a year and the manufacturer will not replace it and expect me to pay out of pocket to ship it back and have it “fixed”. Mind you this isn’t very light and I am in Texas and they want it shipped to California !!
customer_reviews.author: Dog lovers

customer_reviews.title: Decent Press, Not Made to Last
customer_reviews.text: Press worked very well, but you can definitely tell that it is not made to last. 11 months later and the handle is not staying locked down, have to sit there and hold it down. Trying to find a way to contact the company to see if any of this is warrantied, but can't seem to find a single email that directs to them.
customer_reviews.author: b_huynh11

customer_reviews.title: falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Works fine but has fallen apart (while on and hot) multiple times because the bolt unscrews when swinging out and back. Even if it's moved very slow and carefully. Extremely frustrating and dangerous.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Skinner

customer_reviews.title: Shorted out and shocked me, clamp stopped working after 100 presses
customer_reviews.text: Everything went well for the first couple hundred presses. After that, the press began heating unevenly, and soon after I was electrocuted switching the press on due to a faulty ground (luckily no lasting injury). Despite all that, I continued limping it along for another hundred presses or so, until the clamp stopped working and pressure could no longer be applied without holding it down manually. When I asked Fancierstudio for a replacement, they declined because it was past the 90 day warranty (which, fair, however I only use this press intermittently, 400 presses at most). DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.author: Sam J

customer_reviews.title: Get a heat press over cricut easy press!
customer_reviews.text: If you do crafting using HTV YOU NEED THIS!!!!! And throw out your iron lol. I tried applying htv with an iron and I had a hard time with it not sticking to the shirt. So I decided to get this heat press and wow what a great investment. For 1 it’s cheaper than the cricut easy press 2 applies pressure witch the easy press you can’t achieve and 3 its really is fool proof. Settings for new users: 315 F For 15 secs Peel then press again for 5 secs it’s really that easy
customer_reviews.author: kameron

customer_reviews.title: But It!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been regularly using this press for the last 10 months. I debated a long time which size to get and I’m very happy with this one. I’ve used it for shirts ranging from infant to men’s XXL with no issues. I’m very happy that I decided on the swing-away. It allows me the space to situate my shirts/items without worrying about burning myself.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Over heats and burn projects DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 2 or these heat presses and both have over heated started smoking and burned my projects. The first one I was able to return within the 90 days but the last one I have wasted my money it’s outside of the 90 day window by two months so I’m stuck with a heat press and wasted my money I’m very disappointed I thought the first one was just
customer_reviews.author: Spanada Dennis

customer_reviews.title: *update* broken
customer_reviews.text: *update* I've owned this press for about a year and a half. Have probably used it 30 days during that time. Today it started smoking and scortched everything I Pressed. The temp said it dropped to 300 from 401, but the machine was smoking and hotter than ive ever used it. Easy to use and heats up quickly. Purchased for making shirts for my kids and family/friends and highly recomend it for that use. I'd go bigger for commercial use.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: Good for first time user
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Most of the time easy to use. I will say that I do have issues when pulling down the handle to press. I notice that it gets tighter each time I try to use it. I will use the knob on the top to make the pressure less and sometimes it does a hard click ( loud bang) which makes me think I am breaking it. But I will lift up and loosen the pressure more and it works.
customer_reviews.author: jill booth

customer_reviews.title: So very glad I took the plunge on my first heat press
customer_reviews.text: So very glad I took the plunge on my first heat press. This one is small but it's all a first timer needs. Swing away arm is perfect, and I haven't burned myself yet!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing heat press for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this heat press for about 6 months now and I LOVE it. Works wonderfully and I havent had any issue with my HTV peeling on shirts. It is easy to use and no nonsense. Great product for the price. I suggest this to anyone who asks. I have a friend who bought a Cricut press over this and her vinyl peels still and she regrets buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Command

customer_reviews.title: BROKE IN UNDER A YEAR!
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY!! I’ve had this since Sept 2019. It worked great in the beginning and then after about 4 months or so, it started to wear down. The metal parts on the handle wire away. It would break time shards of the black part and the metal part would get onto the shirts I was pressing and they’d get marks in them. I continued using it and it’s now July (less than a year) and the handle totally broke apart. I use it a few days a week, and it did not hold up well at all. Now looking into buying a new one and I definitely would not buy Fancier Studio brand the second time around.
customer_reviews.author: A Val

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am a beginner in making clothes and this is one of the first things I got to start out. It is very easy to use and worth every penny. I use it often and always get great results from it. I would recommend this heat press to anyone debating wether they should get one or not.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase
customer_reviews.text: I thought I was going to have trouble putting it together because of other reviews but it came basically put together and my husband has not stop using it yet...the setup was quick n easy and he quick learned how to work it.
customer_reviews.author: catherine

customer_reviews.title: Overall great
customer_reviews.text: I love this heat press! I’ve had it for almost two years! My only complaints are the mat un sticks from the base often, I’ve had to apply it back with adhesive several times it is also a little small whenever im doing a larger design on a shirt, so I have to move it around a few times!
customer_reviews.author: Meghann Long

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I cannot even believe Amazon would ship a product like this! So very disappointed. Not to mention it is way too heavy so now I will have to figure out a way to get it to the post office to return. It is missing screws and the holes for them are broken off. DO NOT PURCHASE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Emily S.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, works great, exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this heat press to use for sublimation tees I make. I was unsure about the quality with such a competitive price but I have been very pleased with the heat press. It’s very user friendly, easy to set up, and does the job well. It warms up quickly and provides a nice, even press which is really important when making t-shirts. Very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Heath

customer_reviews.title: A GREAT machine for anyone!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first heat press machine - and I cannot say enough good things about it. It was very easy to use straight out of the box. It is a hefty machine that is well made. I use it with heat transfer vinyl. I've made several shirts and onesies - and they have all turned out fantastic. It is such a difference when compared to my projects made with the Easy Press. The vinyl adheres so well even after several washes. I'm even considering buying attachments, later on, to see how it works with hats and mugs. You will not be disappointed with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a really great machine. No complaints. If you're going to do adult tshirts and hoodies it works, but a bigger one would be better. But other than that; kids shirts, onesies, totes, towels, tie bags, work great with this Press. Really decent Press for the money. The beeping is when you turn it on (it beeps literally once) & then when you set the timer it'll beep until you press ok (just like a microwave timer) but I like that because there have been times I didn't use the timer and I walked away and forgot I had just pressed something. So the timer is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fresh off the press
customer_reviews.text: not to bad mouth other products but this is definitely the way to go if you are working on t-shirt designs and vinyl material. I had bought the original cricut heat press and their is no comparison . this is the best option for all of your heat press needs ! highly recommended !!
customer_reviews.author: Roselyn

customer_reviews.title: Very reliable little press!
customer_reviews.text: Within minutes, we had this awesome little machine unboxed, heated, and in full production. We printed 70 tote bags on day one (using 8.5x11 Epson transfer paper), without a hitch. Saved the day when the local printer blew off our deadline. It was sooo easy, AND saved us several hundred dollars by doing it ourselves!
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy to use, heats up fast.
customer_reviews.text: Came quickly (thanks, Prime!). Packaged very well. Very easy instructions. Simple to follow along. What used to take me seemingly forever to do with my iron, took all but 20 seconds to adhere HTV to a bag. It exceeded my expectations. Will follow up in a few months after putting it to the test with a bulk order.
customer_reviews.author: C Vega Kanderski

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use Heat Press
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Heat Press. I found it very easy to use. I was able to make my grandchildren t-shirts with vinyl decoration. The 9x12 inch size is sufficient for my items. Heats evenly and holds the heat.
customer_reviews.author: E. Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Great product Great price
customer_reviews.text: After shopping around finding this product for almost 80% less than an average heat press, I would say it made the difference in my purchase. It arrived sooner than was expected, a big plus. It seemed to be sturdily built, I don't feel there are any weaknesses in the construction. If I ever have to buy another heat press, I will have to be sure to purchase on through this company. The only thing I have an issue is how to adjust and detect the amount of pressure is being applied. If I need less pressure trying make sure it's less is a bit difficult , but workable.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Hunt

customer_reviews.title: It's really easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought a Cricut- then realized that an iron just won't do when it comes to HTV. So I went searching for a heat press. Can't beat the price on this one. It's really easy to use, works wonderfully. The hardest part was finding the right outlet in my house to use that didn't have anything else plugged into it because it does need 15-20. That said, once I got it up and running it was extremely simple to use and I've done everything from XXXL T-shirts to tiny dog shirts with this. I would suggest this heat press to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonite

customer_reviews.title: Don’t believe the negative reviews!
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when my heat press malfunctioned, that the seller wouldn’t replace it. To my surprise they messaged me back the same day with a paid shipping label. All I had to do was drop it off and they sent me a new heat press! Very professional and I love the heat press. It’s simple to use for a beginner and it gets the job done right!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine

customer_reviews.title: Good heat press for personal use
customer_reviews.text: It’s a smaller heat press and it’s perfect for beginners. My heat press is for personal use so it does the job for me. The plates are smaller on this press so it works great for baby/toddler clothes or small adult shirts. You will have to move the item around to make sure the entire image is pressed (if your image is really large). The only issue I have is locking the handle into place. It takes everything I got to lock the handle down. That’s why I give it an overall three stars.
customer_reviews.author: Mara Altman

customer_reviews.title: Temperature will not adjust
customer_reviews.text: Returning for new item. Temperature will not adjust. Control panel appears to be broken.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Affordable, and great heat press
customer_reviews.text: I cannot say enough good things about this machine! Previously to purchasing this heat press, I purchased the Cricut mint one as it matched my machine. Was very disappointed, but then I purchased this machine and it has made all my projects so much easier. Easy and quick to use, while still being affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: ❤️
customer_reviews.text: Use this press almost every day and hasn’t failed me yet!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long😒
customer_reviews.text: I have to hold it because it will not go all the way down anymore!! I barely had it for almost a year but just started using it!
customer_reviews.author: Jannisha Townsend

customer_reviews.title: very easy to use
customer_reviews.text: very easy to use, but wish I had paid attention to the size. Really could use a little bit bigger one. It does an awesome job anyway!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heat press
customer_reviews.text: After 3 weeks...Just started using the silhouette 3 to make tshirts. Purchased this to make it easier and I have to say I love it! Works perfect! Easy to use, heats up quickly. Worth every cent!!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy Burton

customer_reviews.title: Makes Tshirt Making a Breeze
customer_reviews.text: I have been using my new heat press for about a month and I love it! Why in the world I ever used an iron to make tshirts is a mystery to me. The heat press is easy to use and very sturdy. Its a game changer when making tshirts!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith H.

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I originally had the cricut easy press but was dissappointed with it and returned it. This press is compact and great for the t-shirts that I make. I love that the arm totally swings out of the way making it easier to work with. The HTV now only takes the required time to press. I have had no issues with it sticking or pulling when you try to take the backing off as I did with the easy press. Would totally recommend this press.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few uses
customer_reviews.text: Lasted exactly 90 days now doesn't even light up and pops the circuit breaker no matter where it gets plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: HitUpOlas

customer_reviews.title: Great but not what was expected.
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. I might have misread the description but I don’t see any way for it to be able to work in hats or cups. There are also no real instructions. I googled heat settings and so forth. I would recommend this only if you want to upgrade from an iron.
customer_reviews.author: Dom

customer_reviews.title: Needs improvement
customer_reviews.text: I am not highly empress do to not working right after my return was up! Machine goes to error when it warming up and also pressure adjustment don’t work at times! Looks like it leaks something from the back of it
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Ward

customer_reviews.title: Good press, be careful of splinters!!
customer_reviews.text: Nice heat press. Great for smaller projects. One large issue, it come out of the box with a ton of metal shavings on it and in the press. DO NOT WIPE THESE WITH YOUR HAND! I got 4 metal splinters in my hand. Reached out to the company to ask them to add a warning in the box. These splinters look like normal shipping dust from styrofoam, they are not. Get the press but be careful!
customer_reviews.author: Christina Rodrigues

customer_reviews.title: Broken parts
customer_reviews.text: Wires were showing when I received it. Was going to send it back but was going to cost even more money to send back through ups
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Summers

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This was my first heat press and is great for beginners or even those that are more experienced! Easy set up! Super easy to learn the works of it! Doesn't take up a lot of space which is a big plus for me!
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Great for kids shirts
customer_reviews.text: I mainly do kids shirts and this was perfect for it. I didn't have a lot of space but this doesn't take a lot of space despite it being a swing away. I've only used it for about ten shirts right now but hopefully it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Adrienne M.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY! DANGEROUS
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! DANGEROUS. Started smoking and burned shirt after it had just done another just fine with same settings. I believe it shorted out and is defective. Thank goodness Amazon is amazing and gave me a full refund even though it's been just past 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I bought it back in January and it worked fine, it is now April and the stupid thing ...
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what is happening with this heat press. I bought it back in January and it worked fine, it is now April and the stupid thing will NOT heat! It goes up to about 80 and stays there. I opened the back and checked the circuit board and nothing seems to be fried. I have an order to complete and I cannot get the press to work. Answers??
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... for right at a year now and I absolutely love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have had this press for right at a year now and I absolutely love it!! It is still going strong and I am fixing to upgrade to the bigger one! This is perfect if you are doing just personal projects, I highly recommend this to anyone tho who is just starting out and not wanting to spend a ton of money. I have done all of my shirts (Gilden, Hanes, fruit of the loom, etc) at 275 degrees for 45 seconds and they hold up wonderful!!
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for !!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Press is built on par for the price point. Haven’t actually used it yet but briefly tested the the temp and timer which seems to be working at the moment. DISLIKES: press arrived with a bent leg which I repaired because I didn’t want to deal with the return and needed to make a shirt under a time constraint. I also DID NOT receive a Teflon sheet with the press as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love this! Easy to use and I’ve been using it for about 3.5 months, and for over 40 shirts/koozies etc. no issues
customer_reviews.author: Britt

customer_reviews.title: great machine
customer_reviews.text: this is a very simple, very effective, and economic purchase. I have had no problems using it. it is very sturdy and the swing away makes using it very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Lacey Jaye

customer_reviews.title: Will be returning.
customer_reviews.text: Will sadly be returning. It get a little stuck when swinging away, and it is not heating evenly. Love the design and it's size but it wont work for a lot of stuff back to back if it keeps sticking when trying to swing away and not hearing evenly
customer_reviews.author: Emily Hatch

customer_reviews.title: Best investment I made
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but a little bulky, heavy, and needs a wee bit more space available than shown in pictures. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I was out of my six month period but luckily they were nice and replaced it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this heat press less than a year and my handle has broke not once but twice. The first time it was replaced through warranty which Amazon listed as one year warranty, to find out after calling it was only six months... I was out of my six month period but luckily they were nice and replaced it... this time the rivots have completely fallen apart on the handle leaving me with a completely useless press!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Heat Presser
customer_reviews.text: I love my heat presser! I’ve had it for 2 years now and never had a problem with it if you treat it with care. So easy to use and set it up 🙌🏻
customer_reviews.author: Judith

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working within 6 months of purchase
customer_reviews.text: Seemed great until it stopped working not even 6 months after purchase. Now when I turn it on it won't stop beeping and showing hhh. Amazon says to contact seller and I am having difficulty finding a way to do that. Very frustrating!!
customer_reviews.author: danielle johnson

customer_reviews.title: Stress free
customer_reviews.text: This heat press had made making shirts much easier. We we're using an iron at first. It does the job well. The only issue i have is that the hot plate started to come loose and not line up even with the bottom plate. Easy to fix but a pain to have to do often.
customer_reviews.author: Jay sincere p

customer_reviews.title: Great machine
customer_reviews.text: Looooved this machine. Only thing is the top plate was not sturdy and it wiggled. Using up to 350° for t-shirts I had to adjust it with my hands and thats not good. :0( Refund issued 1.5 hrs after dropping it off at UPS. I'd recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: @Tigeas_Tees

customer_reviews.title: Works great for shirt sizes Medium and smaller
customer_reviews.text: Love this heat press! It’s great for my small and personal projects. I will say if you need to press shirts size large and up get a bigger sized heat press. I would buy this again because it is easy to use and works perfectly but I can see myself buying a bigger sized press in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: It works great. I am using it for sublimation and it works very well. It didn't take long to figure out at all. It was ready to go out of the box! It is small (a plus for me) but large enough to do what I need it to do. I give it two thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: eljay

customer_reviews.title: Works good but number display has went out in certain spots
customer_reviews.text: Works good only dislike is after the second time using it the display that shows the temperature has went out. For example when you set it to 380° the 8 will look like a 0 and it’s with all three numbers the top part just seemed to have went out. But so far it continues to operate and function just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Great great press!!
customer_reviews.text: Great great press! This press is a great price and a great product! Super easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Sintina B.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty power cord
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for the 1st month. The cord is very touchy and turns the press off when you swing the arm during every use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s Ok
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok...only good for kid shirts and onesies....should have bought a bigger one
customer_reviews.author: Tasha R. Berkhalter

customer_reviews.title: Great heat press
customer_reviews.text: Love my press....the only things I can complain about is that the pressure is just a knob...others have the actual amount of pressure and the directions are a joke! Luckily, google saved me!
customer_reviews.author: Hefner

customer_reviews.title: Great press
customer_reviews.text: This heat press is fantastic! I love the swing away style, it is really easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Lulu

customer_reviews.title: Comes together and easy to use straight away
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use had one stain but I don't think it will mess it up in any way fist shirt with this came out pretty well. I set my Temp at 260°F for ten seconds.
customer_reviews.author: Carlos Lopez

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: It's a swing away design and everytime it swings out it tightens the pressure of the closure. Kind of a pain. But I guess you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Stitches

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this product. I used it as soon as it came in and it works perfectly! Very easy to use and the swing away feature is a plus!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Star rating until....it now is emitting a horrible burning smell
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this press. It is everything I needed not nearly as bulky as I had visioned. It’s done well but I’ve had it about two years and now it’s emitting a horrible chemical burning smell. I guess I have to buy a new one? I didn’t realize it’d only last a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Christy Hilton

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should! Have not had an issue with it yet. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Realistic Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners. Will buy a bigger one in the future
customer_reviews.text: My first press and i love it. But i do wanna buy a bigger one next
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I love this I have made so many shirts. Works great and easy to use for a starter. I’m ready for a bigger machine now!
customer_reviews.author: Angelique Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love Love Love Love this machine. I can't wait to be with it daily. Its awesome!!
customer_reviews.author: Can't save on Kindle Fire.

customer_reviews.title: it works perfect and it is a perfect size for my craft
customer_reviews.text: I just received my heat press today, it works perfect and it is a perfect size for my craft room
customer_reviews.author: Gwen Reavis

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just finished making 100 T-shirts with this press. I couldn't have done it without my press!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, sturdy, but also lightweight. Perfect for a at home business
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great press
customer_reviews.text: Perfect to make t-shirts for my cheerleaders to wear at practice, as well as for items for the family.
customer_reviews.author: Lida

customer_reviews.title: BEST HEAT PRESS EVER
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this heat press! ALl my friends said I needed a much bigger press but this heat press is perfect. It’s just the right size for my Cricut. It gets very hot I love it
customer_reviews.author: KMel

customer_reviews.title: Ehhhhh
customer_reviews.text: Honestly it was a lot smaller than I would have imagined— and not good when making sweat shirts or anything thick... took me double the time to make a sweatshirt bc I had to turn it around to press on the bottom half . Can’t decide if I want to keep it or not
customer_reviews.author: Julie Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Affordable and Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I love it. It’s the perfect size if you are just starting and it’s easy to store.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Optimistic

customer_reviews.title: great for small projects
customer_reviews.text: Works great for smaller items and clothing, but this size is difficult to press adult shirts.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Great Product/Value
customer_reviews.text: Works like a charm. Heats well. Only downfall is that there are no instructions included with the machine and no heat temp setting/time instructions to accompany the product. After YouTubing, I figure out how hot and long to press without burning the T-shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Ul

customer_reviews.title: Works great but low quality parts.
customer_reviews.text: Works good but I'm scared it's going to break. Everytime I press, it pops.
customer_reviews.author: Henry K

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this for a month and a half and loved it, super easy to use and worked great. But now that it’s past the return time it keeps over heating and beeping.
customer_reviews.author: CChilders

customer_reviews.title: Sparks
customer_reviews.text: Sparked as soon as I plugged it in. Then it would not stop at the set point, it burnt a small hole on top of the heating plate.
customer_reviews.author: Lucio M.

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Havent had any problems, great for beginners and works well.
customer_reviews.author: Aimee

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I love how I can swing the ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I love how I can swing the top heated part out of the way so I can place my vinyls on the shirts with no worries about being burnt!
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Karns

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! The swing away feature is perfect. It’s so easy to use. So glad I went with this size!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna Johns

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: It arrived in great condition and very easy to use. Would recommend it for any beginner.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
